amendment.description: To ensure the safety of properties covered under a housing assistance payment contract.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4011 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4011 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Nelson to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR2964-2966; text: CR S2965) To ensure the safety of properties covered under a housing assistance payment contract.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4011 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4011 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Nelson to Amendment SA 3896.
